instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-01041 Only boots in safe mode
threads.message:
Clean board no corrosion.

T2 was restored and clean install of MacOS via internet already done.

Mac only boots OS in safe mode, normal mode bar gets stuck and or after loading about halve way the bar and all else disappears and nothing happens after that.

Board was tested on a known good separate case with different screen and everything, same problem there.

threads.title: 820-01041 Only boots in safe mode
threads.message:
You may have GPU problem.
Try to install Windows and check if crashes when installs graphiccs driver.

threads.title: 820-01041 Only boots in safe mode
threads.message: Thanks, would this graphics install happen after windows is installed via bootcamp or when I try to install bootcamp drivers?

threads.title: 820-01041 Only boots in safe mode
threads.message: The problem should appear when install bootcamp drivers; if is GPU related.
